entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
